creditline: Gift of funds from the N. Bud and Beverly Grossman Foundation in honor of Dr. Evan M. Maurer, Director Emeritus, for his visionary leadership of The Minneapolis Institute of Arts, 1988-2005
description: rectangular beaded panels (predominately blue) at front and back neck openings, with linear motifs; beaded strips (predominately blue) at sleeves and over shoulders; fur strips and pelts hang in pendants- white
dimension: 35 x 56 in. (88.9 x 142.24 cm) (including sleeve fringe)
medium: Animal hide, beads, fur and animal pelts (ermine), felt, cotton
title: Shirt
